title: SHOP CRYSTALS — Unplug Meditation
cleaned_text: cleansed crystals delivered to your door each month Handpicked crystals, sent to you each month to uplift you & inspire you. Set with an intention for health, joy, abundance, happiness, success, love and more. Boxes include 1-5 crystals, description of the healing properties of each crystal, a meditation to set the months intention in stone and info on how to cleanse your crystals! Only available within the US. Shipping & handling is included.
